name: Mohamed Rashidh
about_me: Welcome to my portfolio! Here, I present my professional journey, technical expertise, and academic achievements in the fields of Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering. With a strong foundation in Python backend development and hands-on experience in building AI-driven systems, I specialize in Generative AI, automation workflows, and scalable API solutions. My education at SLIIT City University strengthened my problem-solving, research, and software design capabilities, enabling me to bridge theory and real-world applications. Explore my projects to see how I apply modern technologies like LangChain, FastAPI, Docker, and n8n to deliver intelligent and automated solutions. Feel free to connect with me for collaborations or opportunities!

items.title: St. Joseph's College, Negombo
items.summary: Completed primary and secondary education with strong academic performance, building a solid foundation in analytical and logical skills.
details: Studied from Grade 1 to Grade 11 at St. Joseph's College, Negombo.
Successfully completed the Sri Lankan Ordinary Level examination.
Developed strong problem-solving and time-management abilities.
Participated in academic and extracurricular activities, fostering teamwork and leadership.
Laid the foundation for pursuing higher studies in science and technology.

items.title: St. Peter's College, Negombo
items.summary: Completed Advanced Level studies in Physical Science, strengthening mathematical and analytical problem-solving capabilities.
details: Specialized in subjects such as Combined Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry.
Developed logical reasoning and quantitative analysis skills.
Engaged in science-related clubs and student projects.
Cultivated discipline and teamwork through group-based learning.
Built a foundation that inspired a career in software engineering and AI.

items.title: SLIIT City University
items.summary: Earned a B.Sc. (Hons) in Computer Science & Software Engineering with first-class results, focusing on AI and backend software development.
details: Completed an honors degree program in Computer Science and Software Engineering.
Studied core modules in programming, databases, algorithms, and software design.
Worked on a final-year research project applying AI to real-world problem-solving.
Developed teamwork and project management skills through collaborative coursework.
Gained practical experience building full-stack applications with modern frameworks.
Excelled in research methodology and comparative integrated systems modules.

items.title: AI Engineer (Python Backend Engineer)
items.summary: Designing and building AI-powered backend systems for Araby.AI using Python, FastAPI, and OpenAI integrations. Focused on generative AI pipelines, real-time sockets, and automation with n8n.
details: Developed and deployed scalable backend APIs using Python and FastAPI for AI-driven applications.
Created API endpoints for image-to-video, text-to-video, and generative image tools.
Integrated OpenAI, Replicate, and Stable Diffusion models for advanced creative automation.
Implemented video and image processing pipelines using FFmpeg for resizing, trimming, and optimization.
Built real-time communication systems using WebSocket and Redis for live AI responses.
Automated AI pipeline workflows using n8n for task scheduling and orchestration.
Deployed and managed containerized applications on AWS EC2 with Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
Collaborated with the AI research team to optimize prompt design and reduce inference time.
Prompt engineering and model fine-tuning for improved AI output quality.
Designing system architecture for AI services to ensure scalability and reliability.
Developing customized AI tools using multiple LLMs and generative models.

items.title: Customer Service and Technical Support
items.summary: Provided technical and customer support, ensuring service quality, system uptime, and effective communication with clients.
details: Assisted customers by troubleshooting hardware and software issues efficiently.
Maintained service stability by performing system diagnostics and updates.
Collaborated with operations teams to improve service workflows and response time.
Recorded and tracked customer issues for analysis and improvement.
Developed communication and multitasking skills in a fast-paced environment.
